lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors argued that Mohamad Jamal Khweis, a former bank teller, joined the Islamic State in Syria and pledged to become a suicide bomber.

headline.print_headline: An American Found in Iraq Fleeing From ISIS Is Charged
headline.main: An American Found in Iraq Fleeing From ISIS Is Charged

snippet: Federal prosecutors argued that Mohamad Jamal Khweis, a former bank teller, joined the Islamic State in Syria and pledged to become a suicide bomber.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge former bank teller Mohamad Jamal Khweis of Alexandria, Va, with joining Islamic State in Syria and pledging to become suicide bomber; Khweis's case is unusual in that he actually made it to Syria to join extremist group and later surrendered in battle zone after changing his mind.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
